questions.question: Which command adds a new column to an existing table?
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE ... ADD

questions.question: Which keyword is used to remove a column from a table?
questions.answer: DROP

questions.question: To change a column's data type, which command is correct?
questions.answer: MODIFY COLUMN

questions.question: What is the correct SQL to add a new column `age` of type INT?
options: ALTER TABLE users ADD age INT;
ADD COLUMN age INT TO users;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE users ADD age INT;

questions.question: How do you drop the column `email` from `users` table?
options: ALTER TABLE users DROP COLUMN email;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE users DROP COLUMN email;

questions.question: Which of the following is used to change column definition?
questions.answer: MODIFY

questions.question: What does ALTER TABLE allow you to do?
questions.answer: Change table structure

questions.question: What keyword is used with ALTER TABLE to rename a column?
questions.answer: CHANGE

questions.question: Which clause adds a new TEXT column named `description`?
options: ALTER TABLE products ADD description TEXT;
ALTER TABLE products INSERT description TEXT;
ALTER products ADD COLUMN description TEXT;
ADD COLUMN description TEXT TO products;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE products ADD description TEXT;

questions.question: What keyword is used with ALTER TABLE to change column name and type?
questions.answer: CHANGE

questions.question: You want to increase the size of `title` column from VARCHAR(50) to VARCHAR(100), what’s the correct SQL?
options: ALTER TABLE books MODIFY title VARCHAR(100);
ALTER TABLE books ADD title VARCHAR(100);
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE books MODIFY title VARCHAR(100);

questions.question: How do you rename the column `username` to `user_name` in `users` table?
options: ALTER TABLE users CHANGE username user_name VARCHAR(50);
ALTER TABLE users MODIFY user_name VARCHAR(50);
ALTER TABLE users RENAME COLUMN username TO user_name;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE users CHANGE username user_name VARCHAR(50);

questions.question: You need to remove a column `discount` from `sales`, what do you use?
options: ALTER TABLE sales DROP COLUMN discount;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE sales DROP COLUMN discount;

questions.question: To add a column `status` with default value 'active', which command works?
options: ALTER TABLE accounts ADD status VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'active';
ADD COLUMN status TO accounts DEFAULT 'active';
ALTER accounts ADD COLUMN status TEXT;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE accounts ADD status VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'active';

questions.question: What is the result of ALTER TABLE emp DROP COLUMN age?
questions.answer: Removes the column `age` from `emp`

questions.question: How would you change the data type of `rating` to FLOAT in `reviews` table?
options: ALTER TABLE reviews MODIFY rating FLOAT;
UPDATE TABLE reviews SET rating = FLOAT;
ALTER TABLE reviews ADD rating FLOAT;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE reviews MODIFY rating FLOAT;

questions.question: You want to add a `created_at` column with DATE type to `orders`, use:
options: ALTER TABLE orders ADD created_at DATE;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE orders ADD created_at DATE;

questions.question: Which SQL alters `dept_id` column to INT type in departments table?
options: ALTER TABLE departments MODIFY dept_id INT;
ALTER departments CHANGE dept_id TO INT;
ALTER TABLE departments ADD dept_id INT;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE departments MODIFY dept_id INT;

questions.question: To drop the column `phone` in `customers`, you write:
options: ALTER TABLE customers DROP COLUMN phone;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE customers DROP COLUMN phone;

questions.question: Which command changes column `dob` from DATE to DATETIME in `students`?
options: ALTER TABLE students MODIFY dob DATETIME;
ALTER TABLE students CHANGE dob DATETIME;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE students MODIFY dob DATETIME;
